activities.name: Iterate Through ECDC Files and URLs

transformations.name: SplitDailyFromWeekly
transformations.description: Conditionally distributing the data in indicator groups, based on columns 'indicator'

scriptLines: RemoveDuplicateColumns split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
